BusinessName.BusinessNameLine2Txt: Planned Parenthood of the St Louis Region

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: FAMILY PLANNING SERVICES - TO PROVIDE OPTIONS, COUNSELING, AND GYNECOLOGICAL AND REPRODUCTIVE MEDICAL SERVICES TO THE ST. LOUIS METRO AREA PUBLIC.
IRS990.MissionDesc: FAMILY PLANNING SERVICES - TO PROVIDE OPTIONS, COUNSELING, AND GYNECOLOGICAL AND REPRODUCTIVE MEDICAL SERVICES TO THE ST. LOUIS METRO AREA PUBLIC.
IRS990.Desc: FAMILY PLANNING SERVICES - PROVIDES OPTIONS, COUNSELING, AND GYNECOLOGICAL AND REPRODUCTIVE MEDICAL SERVICES TO THE PUBLIC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC). ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN INCLUDED IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. U.S. GAAP PROVIDES ACCOUNTING AND DISCLOSURE GUIDANCE ABOUT POSITIONS TAKEN BY AN ORGANIZATION IN ITS TAX RETURNS THAT MIGHT BE UNCERTAIN. MANAGEMENT HAS CONSIDERED ITS TAX POSITIONS AND BELIEVES THAT ALL OF THE POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE ORGANIZATION IN ITS FEDERAL AND STATE EXEMPT RETURNS ARE MORE LIKELY THAN NOT TO BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION. THE ORGANIZATION'S RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY FEDERAL AND STATE TAXING AUTHORITIES, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY ARE FILED.

ALL COMPENSATION IS PAID BY THE RELATED ORGANIZATION, PLANNED PARENTHOOD OF THE ST. LOUIS REGION AND SOUTHWEST MISSOURI ("PPSLRSWMO") (EIN 43-0652666). COMPENSATION AMOUNTS ALLOCATED TO REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH SERVICES OF PLANNED PARENTHOOD OF THE ST. LOUIS REGION HAVE BEEN REPORTED ON FORM 990, PART IX, LINES 5, 7, 8, 9, AND 10. PPSLRSWMO USES A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, WRITTEN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT, COMPENSATION SURVEY STUDY, AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OR COMPENSATION COMMITTEE TO ESTABLISH COMPENSATION OF THE CEO.

PLANNED PARENTHOOD OF THE ST. LOUIS REGION AND SOUTHWEST MISSOURI ("PPSLRSWMO") HAS A SECTION 457(B) NONQUALIFIED DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN, AVAILABLE ONLY TO SENIOR MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION. PPSLRSWMO MAKES CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE PLAN BASED UPON AN AMOUNT DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. DURING 2021, CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE PLAN TOTALED $21,290. THE FOLLOWING INDIVIDUALS INCLUDED ON FORM 990, PART VII, SECTION A, LINE 1A REPORTED THE FOLLOWING AMOUNTS FOR THEIR PARTICIPATION IN THIS PLAN: COLLEEN MCNICHOLAS - $2,400 YAMELSIE RODRIGUEZ - $4,727 WILLIAM DEAN - $2,400 CATHERINE WILLIAMS - $4,000 TONI SCHNEIDER - $2,400 APRIL MICKENS-JOLLY - $2,400 ANGELA POSTAL - $2,400 BONYEN LEE-GILMORE- $563 MARY M. KOGUT WAS PAID $111,090 FOR 457(B) NONQUALIFIED DEFERRED COMPENSATION IN 2021, WHICH IS THE THIRD OF 3 PAYMENTS TO BE PAID OUT OVER 3 YEARS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11B:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY THE CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM THAT PREPARES THE ANNUAL FINANCIAL REPORTS FOR THE ORGANIZATION. THE FORM IS THEN PROVIDED TO THE FINANCE AND AUDIT COMMITTEE FOR REVIEW. THE FINANCE AND AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE RETURN. TO ASSIST IN THIS PROCESS, A PRESENTATION SUMMARIZING THE ACTIVITY IS PROVIDED BY THE CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM TO THE FINANCE AND AUDIT COMMITTEE, WHEREIN THE FINANCE AND AUDIT COMMITTEE SUGGESTS ANY CHANGES OR OBTAINS ANY NECESSARY EXPLANATIONS. THE FINANCE AND AUDIT COMMITTEE THEN PROVIDES THE FULL BOARD WITH THE FINAL FORM 990 WITH ITS RECOMMENDATION FOR APPROVAL. AFTER FULL BOARD APPROVAL, THE CEO THEN AUTHORIZES THE ELECTRONIC FILING OF THE ORIGINAL RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12C:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE STAFF AND BOARD RECEIVE A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND SIGN ACKNOWLEDGING AGREEMENTS. POLICY SPECIFIES HOW AND WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR REVIEW/REQUIRED ACTION REGARDING NONCOMPLIANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH SERVICES COMPLIES WITH ALL STATE AND FEDERAL LAWS AND REGULATIONS BY MAKING ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VII-Compensation & Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 15:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL COMPENSATION IS PAID BY THE RELATED ORGANIZATION, PLANNED PARENTHOOD OF THE ST. LOUIS REGION AND SOUTHWEST MISSOURI ("PPSLRSWMO") (EIN 43-0652666). COMPENSATION AMOUNTS ALLOCATED TO REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH SERVICES OF PLANNED PARENTHOOD OF THE ST. LOUIS REGION HAVE BEEN REPORTED ON FORM 990, PART IX, LINES 5, 7, 8, 9, AND 10. PPSLRSWMO USES A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, WRITTEN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT, COMPENSATION SURVEY STUDY, AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OR COMPENSATION COMMITTEE TO ESTABLISH COMPENSATION OF THE CEO.
